scripts.install-node: nvm install 20.8.0 && nvm install 18.18.0 && nvm install 16.20.0
scripts.benchmark-layered-loader: npm run benchmark:layered-loader-lru && npm run benchmark:layered-loader-fifo && npm run benchmark:layered-loader-lru-object && npm run benchmark:layered-loader-fifo-object
scripts.benchmark-all: npm run benchmark:async-cache-dedupe && npm run benchmark:data-loader && npm run benchmark:layered-loader-lru && npm run benchmark:layered-loader-fifo && npm run benchmark:layered-loader-lru-object && npm run benchmark:layered-loader-fifo-object && npm run benchmark:no-dedupe
